name: Grafana Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Grafana Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume the Grafana API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume the Grafana API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: dashboard

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll
available_options: Delete (值: delete) - Delete a user from the current organization
Get Many (值: getAll) - Retrieve many users in the current organization
Update (值: update) - Update a user in the current organization

title.name: title
title.description: Title of the dashboard to create
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Title | 作用: Title of the dashboard to create | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: email (值: None) - Email of the team to create

dashboardUidOrUrl.name: dashboardUidOrUrl
dashboardUidOrUrl.description: Unique alphabetic identifier or URL of the dashboard to update
dashboardUidOrUrl.natural_language_description: 参数名: Dashboard UID or URL | 作用: Unique alphabetic identifier or URL of the dashboard to update | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: name (值: None) - Name of the team to filter by

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: role (值: None) - New role for the user

name.name: name
name.description: Name of the team to create
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Name of the team to create | (必填项)

teamId.name: teamId
teamId.description: Team to retrieve all members from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
teamId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Team Name or ID | 作用: Team to retrieve all members from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

userId.name: userId
userId.description: ID of the user to delete
userId.natural_language_description: 参数名: User ID | 作用: ID of the user to delete | (必填项)

memberId.name: memberId
memberId.description: User to remove from the team. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
memberId.natural_language_description: 参数名: User Name or ID | 作用: User to remove from the team. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)
